item.description:
Isn't it really hard to find good Indian classical music concerts to go to? Whether it be Hindustani Classical, Karnatic Classical, or Ghazals, they aren't publicized the way bollywood concerts are, making them so easy to miss.

Well, no more! Indian Friends Meetup will post a date for a nearby Indian classical music concert every month! The first concert we are going to, is on August 22nd at the Sri Lakshmi Temple in Ashland (117 Waverly Street, Ashland, MA 01721). The following is the agenda for the afternoon:

Hindustani Segment
1:30pm – 3:30pm
Purba Debnath (Vocal)
Akshay Navaladi (Tabla)
Shraddha Agrawal (Harmonium)

Karnatic Segment
3:30pm – 5:30pm
Vikram Sundararaman (Vocal)
S.P. Ananthapadmanabha (Violin)
Rajna K. Swaminathan (Mridangam)

Cost: Free!

We hope to see you there!
item.name: Dopeher-e-Sangeet
